structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: City recreational commission to be established -- General powers.
law.text: Any city establishing or acquiring and desiring to maintain and operate a recreational project or projects under the provisions of KRS 97.100 to 97.240 shall by ordinance provide for the appointment of a city recreational commission to operate and control the project or projects. The commission shall be a corporation with perpetual succession, and may contract and be contracted with, sue and be sued, have and use a corporate seal and alter and renew it at pleasure.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2741p-13.
